en-gb: Woman has been reported missing from her home
Officer sent to investigate and finds more information about the woman, and gets a recent photo
Photo uploaded to INSPEC2T app, a member of the public has informed local police she saw her on top of a bus stop
Officers locate the missing woman and take her to hospital for a checkup, she later returned home and is now safe
Officers search a larger area and eventually find the woman and return her to her home
Body has been found in a river and has been identified as the missing person
Reports of someone moving a wheelie bin
The 2 neighbours have started a verbal argument outside the property
Reported that one of the neighbours has assaulted the other outside the property
A man has been stabbed and is slumped next to the wheelie bin
Member of the public provides photographic evidence of man with a mechete using the INSPEC2T app
A citizen has informed the police that he saw which person assaulted the other
Issue dissolves itself and is no longer a problem
The officer has managed to stop the incident from developing, both neighbours have agreed to ignore the incident
The officer has calmed down the two neighbours and the verbal abuse stops
The officer manages to break up the fight and send the two neighbours on their way
Man has been left on the street until paramedics arrive, no arrests made, general public happiness decreases
Offender has been arrested by police after finding him in a shed nearby
Officers clean up and a man is arrested for the assault
Using citizen information, the officers manage to locate the man and arrest him
